short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View all hostnames requested by the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover the hidden network behind every web page with Hostname List, a powerful Chrome extension designed for curious users and developers alike. This extension display all hostnames associated with the current webpage's requests for enhanced transparency in online browsing.
